name: Vibrava

ability.name: Compound Eyes
ability.effect: Once per turn, you may reveal the top 5 cards of your deck. If none of them are the same type, you may put one into your hand. Shuffle the rest into your deck.

attacks.name: Rainbow Wing
attacks.effect: Deals 10 damage times each different type of Basic Energy attached to this Pokemon.

flavor: Trapinch's surprise evolution has it metamorphesizing. It changes its form completely and takes to the sky.
